item.title: Feds expanding N.C. immigration enforcement actions to Raleigh, mayor says
item.description: Federal immigration authorities will expand their enforcement action in North Carolina to Raleigh, the mayor said, while Customs and Border Protection...

item.title: Woman set on fire during fight on CTA train in Chicago's Loop
item.description: An arson investigation is underway after a woman was set on fire while riding a CTA Blue Line in Chicago's Loop on Monday night.

item.title: Roblox announces measures to strengthen protections for minors
item.description: Facing pressure from states and families, Roblox will require players to use AI-powered technology that helps verify their age.

item.title: Japan says jets scrambled as China flew drone near island close to Taiwan
item.description: Tension between Japan and China has escalated over the new Japanese leader's suggestion Tokyo could intervene militarily if Beijing attacks Taiwan.

item.title: Mystery deepens after 4 family members die at popular tourist site
item.description: Eleven people have been detained in connection with the deaths of four members of the same family in Istanbul, the state-run Anadolu news agency said.
